pr_title: [JENKINS-21837] Do not record user creating an agent

timeline.body:
Should there be more detail in the javadoc that explains the context why it was removed?  For example, should this comment include a link to JENKINS-21837 or possibly the majority of the text from the pull request?
```suggestion
     * Removed with no replacement.
     * This broke in Jenkins 2.2 for new agents created from the UI (copying existing agents and from the CLI probably still worked).
     * Nobody noticed for almost four years.
     * Recording of the agent creator's userId was removed without the usual plugin detachment process because the issue was undetected for such a long time.
     * See JENKINS-21837 for more details.
```

timeline.bodyHTML:
Should there be more detail in the javadoc that explains the context why it was removed? For example, should this comment include a link to JENKINS-21837 or possibly the majority of the text from the pull request?

Suggested change
* Removed with no replacement.
* Removed with no replacement.
* This broke in Jenkins 2.2 for new agents created from the UI (copying existing agents and from the CLI probably still worked).
* Nobody noticed for almost four years.
* Recording of the agent creator's userId was removed without the usual plugin detachment process because the issue was undetected for such a long time.
* See JENKINS-21837 for more details.
timeline.author: MarkEWaite

replies.bodyText: Looks more like a job for the Git history.
